en: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
Smile, it's a free therapy.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

songs: Best Day of My Life - American Authors
Walking on Sunshine - Katrina & The Waves

en: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
It's okay to cry. It means you care.
Sometimes, sadness is just rest for the soul.
For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
Anger doesn’t solve anything. It builds nothing.
Speak when you are angry and you'll make the best speech you’ll ever regret.
Surprise is the greatest gift life can grant us.
Life is full of surprises, some better than others.
Expect the unexpected.

songs: Can't Stop the Feeling! - Justin Timberlake

en: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
Feel the fear and do it anyway.
Don't let fear decide your future.

songs: Everybody's Got to Learn Sometime - Beck
Boulevard of Broken Dreams - Green Day

en: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
Even in disgust, there's a lesson to learn.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence.
Sometimes, doing nothing is doing everything.
In stillness, we find clarity.
